snippet: The ad has been played repeatedly on the cable and network news since Priorities USA Action released it earlier this week and has been seen nearly half-a-million times on YouTube.
abstract: The ad has been played repeatedly on the cable and network news since Priorities USA Action released it earlier this week and has been seen nearly half-a-million times on YouTube.

byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

headline.main: Criticized 'Super PAC' Ad Has Yet to Be Broadcast as a Paid Commercial
